metadata.title: Waypoint by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Waypoint provides a modern workflow for build, deploy, and release across platforms.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Waypoint Integrations.

integration.name: Docker Ref
integration.description: The Docker Ref plugin refers to an existing Docker image, passing its image information - the image name and tag - to the Waypoint lifecycle.

flags.name: Built-in
flags.description: This integration is shipped in the core product and does not need to be installed.

activeRelease.readme:
The Docker Ref plugin refers to an existing Docker image, passing its image
information, the image name and tag, to the Waypoint lifecycle.

### Components

1. [Builder](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/docker-ref/latest/components/builder/docker-ref-builder)

### Related Plugins

1. [Docker](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/docker)

components.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Use an existing, pre-built Docker image without modifying it.

### Interface

- Input: **component.Source**
- Output: **docker.Image**

### Examples

```hcl
build {
  use "docker-ref" {
    image = "gcr.io/my-project/my-image"
    tag   = "abcd1234"
  }
}
```
components.name: Docker Ref Builder

variables.description:
The image to pull.
This should NOT include the tag (the value following the ':' in a Docker image). Use `tag` to define the image tag.
The tag of the image to pull.
